Description_lang: In his former life, before making the ritualistic changes to become one of the Illidari, Jace was a powerful mage. He still retains much of his magic knowledge. Combined with his mastery over the fel energies coursing through his body, he has created many useful devices for the Illidari, such as the nether crucibles, demon traps, and wards.
AuraDescription_lang: Jace Darkweaver has mastered the ways of the Vengeance demon hunter. He is most notable for his ability to enact fel rituals and provide the Illidari with creative means of dealing with tough situations.

description_blz.en_US: In his former life, before making the ritualistic changes to become one of the Illidari, Jace was a powerful mage. He still retains much of his magic knowledge. Combined with his mastery over the fel energies coursing through his body, he has created many useful devices for the Illidari, such as the nether crucibles, demon traps, and wards.
description_blz.es_MX: En su vida anterior, antes de realizar los cambios ritualistas para convertirse en uno de los Illidari, Jace era un poderoso mago. Aún retiene gran parte de su conocimiento mágico. Combinado con su maestría sobre las energías viles que recorren su cuerpo, ha creado muchos aparatos útiles para los Illidari, como los crisoles del vacío, las trampas para demonios y los resguardos.
description_blz.pt_BR: Em sua vida antiga, antes de realizar as mudanças rituais para se tornar um dos Illidari, Jace foi um mago poderoso. Ele ainda retém muito do seu conhecimento mágico. Combinado com seu domínio das energias vis que fluem por seu corpo, ele criou muitos dispositivos úteis para os Illidari, como crisóis etéreos, armadilhas para demônios e proteções.
description_blz.de_DE: In seinem alten Leben, bevor er sich den ritualhaften Veränderungen unterwarf, die ihn zu einem Illidari machten, war Jace ein mächtiger Magier. Auch heute verfügt er noch über einen Großteil seines Wissens um die Magie. Durch dieses Wissen und seine Macht über die Teufelsenergien, die seinen Körper durchströmen, konnte er viele nützliche Gerätschaften für die Illidari erschaffen, wie die Nethertiegel, Dämonenfallen und Zauberschutze.
description_blz.en_GB: In his former life, before making the ritualistic changes to become one of the Illidari, Jace was a powerful mage. He still retains much of his magic knowledge. Combined with his mastery over the fel energies coursing through his body, he has created many useful devices for the Illidari, such as the nether crucibles, demon traps, and wards.
description_blz.es_ES: En su vida anterior, antes de realizar los cambios rituales para ser uno de los Illidari, Jace era un mago poderoso. Aún conserva buena parte de sus conocimientos mágicos, que combina con su dominio de las energías viles que fluyen por su cuerpo para crear numerosos dispositivos útiles para los Illidari, como crisoles abisales, trampas para demonios y resguardos.
description_blz.fr_FR: Avant de subir les modifications rituelles qui ont fait de lui un Illidari, Jace était un puissant mage. Il a conservé une grande partie de ses connaissances occultes, qu’il a savamment associées à la maîtrise de l’énergie gangrenée présente en lui pour créer de nombreux dispositifs fort utiles pour les Illidari ; les creusets du Néant, les pièges à démons ou encore les protections anti-démoniaques ne sont que quelques exemples de ses inventions.
description_blz.it_IT: Nella sua vita precedente, prima dei cambiamenti rituali per diventare un Illidari, Jace era un potente Mago. Egli conserva ancora gran parte della sua conoscenza magica. In combinazione con la padronanza delle energie vili che scorrono nel suo corpo, ha creato molti dispositivi utili per gli Illidari, come i crogioli fatui, le trappole per demoni e le protezioni.
description_blz.ru_RU: Пока Джейс не прошел через ритуал посвящения и не стал иллидари, он был могущественным магом. Большую часть своих познаний он сохранил до сих пор. Сочетая мастерство чародея с энергией Скверны, которая переполняет его тело, он создал для иллидари много полезных устройств, таких как горнила Пустоты, ловушки на демонов и обереги.
description_blz.ko_KR: 일리다리의 일원이 되기 전, 강력한 마법사였던 제이스는 여전히 상당한 마법 지식을 가지고 있습니다. 몸속을 흐르는 지옥 마력을 사용해 일리다리에게 유용한 물건을 다수 만들어냈는데, 지금까지 만든 장치 중에서는 황천 도가니, 악마의 덫, 수호물 등이 대표적입니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 在通過儀式的轉化成為一名伊利達瑞之前，捷斯原本是一位威力強大的法師。他仍舊保了許多魔法知識。結合專精的知識與充盈全身的魔化能量，他為伊利達瑞製作了許多有用的裝置，像是虛空法陣、惡魔陷阱和結界。
description_blz.zh_CN: 在杰斯之前的人生中，在经历仪式的转变成为伊利达雷成员之前，他是一位强大的法师。现在他仍然保留了大部分魔法知识。再加上对体内涌动的邪能能量的掌握，他为伊利达雷制造了诸多有用的设备，例如虚空坩埚、恶魔陷阱和守卫。
